mods.abstract: Image of a woman from behind, as she stands facing a poster labelled "The Enduring Spirit: Art of the Holocaust," displayed in one of the Central Square bear pits. Other posters, including one labelled "Einsatzgruppen: Mobile Killing Squads," and a television on a trolley can be seen in the background.
mods.note: "One of the Bear Pits - Holocaust Week.," "March '91" is written on the back of the photograph.
